title: Patch 7.14 error 004

embed.description: Post with 0 votes and 2 views. Shared by xReignManx. Patch 7.14

body: What do I do to fix this?

replies.body: This error can come up if the patcher is getting blocked from updating, and can happen from either a security setting or connection issue.  As a first step, try out each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your game files has access to update.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2eu9Qugl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-12T16:49:14.774+0000)
>
> This error can come up if the patcher is getting blocked from updating, and can happen from either a security setting or connection issue.  As a first step, try out each step in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your game files has access to update.  Let me know if you have any questions!
